column4: hello how do i get out of the low-graphics mode? My 10.04 lts startsup every time in low-graphics mode
What graphics card do you have? Has Ubuntu ever worked on this machine (i.e. without low graphics mode)?
yest it has  dont know about graphics card
When did you start having this problem? You can find the graphics card by running "lspci | grep VGA" in a terminal.
